name: BankBoard Game - Money Manager
description:
BankBoard Game is an app lets you focus on the fun sides of MONOPOLY® by handling all the money transactions for you, So you can enjoy the game MONOPOLY® without having to worry about counting money anymore. Now you can become comfortable with this app.


Features:
• Handling all cash transactions within the app.
• Transfer money by dragging and dropping between players or the bank.
• Add players by click the (+) button.
• BankBoard Game keeps track of the accounts of up to 6 players.
• Support for All iPhone and iPad.
• Simple and easy to use.

Notes:
MONOPOLY® is a registered trademark of Hasbro, Inc. The developer of BankBoard Game is not affiliated with Hasbro and not associated with or endorsed by Hasbro.
